Event.name: New instruction fetch performing
New data fetch performing
Core read request count
System Bus 1 utilization
Event.Description: Number of cycles during which System Bus 1 bus is occupied

Event.name: System Bus 2 utilization
Event.Description: Number of cycles during which System Bus 2 is occupied

Event.name: Dynamic memory queue occupied
Event.Description: Number of cycles when the dynamic memory controller queue is not empty

Event.name: Dynamic memory queue occupied by more than 1 request
Event.Description: Number of cycles when the dynamic memory controller queue has 2 or more requests

Event.name: Dynamic memory queue occupied by more than 2 requests
Event.Description: Number of cycles when the dynamic memory controller queue has 3 or more reuests

Event.name: Dynamic memory queue occupied by more than 3 requests
Event.Description: Number of cycles when the dynamic memory controller queue is full

Event.name: Static memory queue occupied
Event.Description: Number of cycles when the static memory controler queue is not empty

Event.name: Static memory queue occupied by more than 1 request
Event.Description: Number of cycles when the static memory controller queue has 2 or more requests

Event.name: Static memory queue occupied by more than 2 requests
Event.Description: Number of cycles when the static memory controller queue has 3 or more requests

Event.name: Static memory queue occupied by more than 3 requests
Event.Description: Number of cycles when the static memory controller queue is full

Event.name: Internal SRAM memory queue occupied
Event.Description: Number of cycles when the internal memory controller queue is not empty

Event.name: Internal SRAM memory queue occupied by more than 1 request
Event.Description: Number of cycles when the internal memory controller queue has two or more requests

Event.name: Internal SRAM memory queue occupied by more than 2 requests
Event.Description: Number of cycles when the internal memory controller queue 3 or more requests

Event.name: Internal SRAM memory queue occupied by more than 3 requests
Event.Description: Number of cycles when the internal memory controller queue is full

Event.name: External memory controller bus is occupied
External data flash bus is occupied
Core write access count
System bus 1 bus request
Event.Description: Length of time that at least one bus request is asserted on System Bus 1

Event.name: System bus 2 bus request
Event.Description: Length of time that at least one bus request is asserted on System Bus 2

Event.name: System bus 1 bus retries
System bus 2 bus retries
Temperature level 1
Event.Description: Temperature level 1 (time the PXA930 processor has spent in temperature range 1). The PSR register shows the current temperature range of operation (TSS field)

Event.name: Temperature level 2
Event.Description: Temperature level 2 (time the PXA930 processor has spent in temperature range 2). The PSR register shows the current temperature range of operation (TSS field)

Event.name: Temperature level 3
Event.Description: Temperature level 3 (time the PXA930 processor has spent in temperature range 3). The PSR register shows the current temperature range of operation (TSS field)

Event.name: Temperature level 4
Event.Description: Temperature level 4 (time the PXA930 processor has spent in temperature range 4). The PSR register shows the current temperature range of operation (TSS field)

Event.name: Core read/write latency measurement 1
Event.Description: Amount of time when core has more than 1 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: Core read/write latency measurement 2
Event.Description: Amount of time when core has more than 2 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: Core read/write latency measurement 3
Event.Description: Amount of time when core has more than 3 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: Core read/write latency measurement 4
Event.Description: Amount of time when core has more than 4 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 1 to internal memory read/write latency measurement
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 1 to internal memory has more than 1 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 1 to internal memory read/write latency measurement 2
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 1 to internal memory has more than 2 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 1 to internal memory read/write latency measurement 3
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 1 to internal memory has more than 3 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 1 to internal memory read/write latency measurement 4
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 1 to internal memory has more than 4 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 1 to dynamic/static memory read/write latency measurement
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 1 to dynamic/static memory has more than 1 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 1 to dynamic/static memory read/write latency measurement 2
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 1 to dynamic/static memory has more than 2 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 1 to dynamic/static memory read/write latency measurement 3
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 1 to dynamic/static memory has more than 3 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 1 to dynamic/static memory read/write latency measurement 4
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 1 to dynamic/static memory has more than 4 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 2 to internal memory read/write latency measurement
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 2 to internal memory has more than 1 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 2 to internal memory read/write latency measurement 2
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 2 to internal memory has more than 2 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 2 to internal memory read/write latency measurement 3
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 2 to internal memory has more than 3 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 2 to internal memory read/write latency measurement 4
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 2 to internal memory has more than 4 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 2 to dynamic/static memory read/write latency measurement
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 2 to dynamic/static memory has more than 1 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 2 to dynamic/static memory read/write latency measurement 2
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 2 to dynamic/static memory has more than 2 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 2 to dynamic/static memory read/write latency measurement 3
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 2 to dynamic/static memory has more than 3 read/write requests outstanding

Event.name: System bus 2 to dynamic/static memory read/write latency measurement 4
Event.Description: Amount of time when System Bus 2 to dynamic/static memory has more than 4 read/write requests outstanding
